title: Super Bowl 2026 Halftime Show Lineup Announced: Beyoncé Returns
introText: Beyoncé will headline the Super Bowl 2026 halftime show, marking her return to the biggest stage in American entertainment. The announcement has generated massive anticipation for the Las Vegas event.

content.content: Beyoncé's return to the Super Bowl stage follows her legendary 2013 performance and 2016 appearance. The show will reportedly feature a 15-minute extravaganza with multiple surprise guests.
Super Bowl LX will be held at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. The city is preparing for the largest influx of visitors in its history.
The announcement sent social media into a frenzy, with #BeyonceSuperBowl trending worldwide for 48 hours. Ticket demand for the game itself has surged following the news.
